name: Thea Calaquian
bio: Thea is our powerhouse, keeping the team motivated while staying positive and organized. She keeps us on the same page while ensuring every decision has purpose. Along with leading the team, she also designs engaging visuals that tie our work together seamlessly. Powered by determination, and what‚Äôs probably her third cup of coffee, she keeps the team grounded in reality. When not in our team meetings, you can find her drawing in her notebook with what‚Äôs probably her fourth cup of coffee.

name: Angie Duong
bio: Angie is a designer with a happily scattered focus, she enjoy diving into everything from UX/UI and graphics to digital painting. Angie's brain doesn't truly boot up without her daily matcha or bubble tea, they're her non-negotiable creative fuel. Angie get a real kick out of front-end coding too, and she is a collaborative problem-solver at heart, always drawn to challenging projects because they're where she learn from the most. Basically, she is just someone who loves making things and learning along the way.

name: Stefan Dorosh
bio: Stefan is a Full Stack Web Developer. Born in Russia, raised in Bali, and now based in Canada, 20 years old. Spent most of school gaming with friends, never quite sure what direction to take after graduating. Liked math, but it was boring - so he chose development because, well, computers are cool. Loves organizing files into folders, hates Linux, and in his free time either annoys people or bedrots. Knows how to kite surf and do parkourü™Å.

name: Sandy Chow
bio: Sandy is a UI/UX designer and researcher shaping digital experiences through empathy, clarity, and purpose. She combines creativity with critical thinking to connect technology and human emotion. Cat and caffeine keep her working. She enjoys analyzing MBTI types for fun.

name: Bonnie Wan
bio: Bonnie is a graphic designer with over 5 years of experience and a strong marketing background, currently expanding her expertise into UI/UX design. Her multidisciplinary experience allows her to bridge user needs and business objectives, creating designs that are both visually compelling and strategically effective.

name: Alyssa Huggins
bio: Alyssa plays a dual role in our team, using her talents in both design and coding to support our team. Whether she's creating stunning interfaces or coding easy-to-use sites, Alyssa ensures that both our app's functionality and design go hand in hand. When she isn't collating research findings or refining wireframes, she can usually be found recharging with a coffee (or two) in hand.

name: Matheus Demeis
bio: Matheus is a 19-year-old full stack web developer originally from Brazil. His interest in technology started when he was a kid, because he grew up playing video games. He likes working on both the front and back ends of web apps, but he‚Äôs more into making clean, efficient back end systems. When he‚Äôs not coding, you‚Äôll find him staying active with sports like soccer, snowboarding, and jiu-jitsu, anything that keeps him moving and challenged.

name: Lam Thai
bio: Lam is a Full Stack Web Developer originally from China and born and raised in Vietnam. His love for technology started with video games as a kid, which sparked his curiosity to learn how things work. He enjoys building both the front and back ends of web applications, with a special focus on creating clean and efficient back-end systems. Outside of tech, Lam likes going to the gym, playing sports like soccer and basketball, and spending time outdoors hiking or camping. He also loves traveling, and one of his biggest dreams is to explore the world.
